thread.title: Davos 2018: CEOs eye more global growth

title: Davos 2018: CEOs eye more global growth
text:
Davos 2018: CEOs eye more global growth 1:48pm IST - 01:44 
Chief executives are more optimistic about economic outlook than they have been for many years though anxieties are rising about geopolitics, cyber threats and terrorism, a survey has shown at the World Economic Forum in Davos. Sonia Legg reports.
